biotools.summary:
An extensible Galaxy plug-In for multi-omics data visualization and exploration.

The Galaxy MVP visualization plugin enables viewing of results produced from workflows integrating genomic sequencing data and mass spectrometry proteomics data.

bioschemas.name: MVP_A
